level.heading: Special Education Reform Plan.
level.text: The Superintendent of Schools shall develop a Special Education Reform Plan ("Reform Plan") which shall include the following:
Roles and responsibilities of all District agencies that provide special education related services;
Targeted savings activities for fiscal years 2003 through 2005; and
Continued review and input from Task Force members.
